summary: This document appears to be a financial authorization form from Deutsche Bank Wealth Management, allowing an agent to trade securities on behalf of the undersigned. It outlines the responsibilities and indemnities associated with such trading activities, emphasizing the authority granted to the agent and the continuing nature of this authorization.
keyFacts: The document is a financial authorization for trading securities.
It allows an agent to buy and sell stocks, bonds, and other securities on behalf of the undersigned.
The undersigned agrees to indemnify Deutsche Bank for any losses arising from these transactions.
The authorization remains in effect until revoked by the undersigned.
The document is marked as confidential and pertains to Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.
